ComicInfo.Series: Red Sonja: Birth of the She-Devil
ComicInfo.Summary:
The fiery conclusion! Red Sonja has travelled long and hard to come to terms with her mentor â€“ Ozzyusand save Shashana! Now, the trio hurtle towards the oblivion and despair of the villainous Raka, while working to restore the kingdom of the good king Andol! Look for a trio of incredible covers: Master Painter Lucio Parillo, interior artist Sergio Davila, and the return of cosplaying favorite, Shannon Kingston!
